definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: When Chou Chin heard Chin You-yu telling his sad story, he cried even harder.
sentences.chinese: 周進見姊夫說中他的心事，越發號啕大哭。

sentences.english: Her brother-in-law's car was made in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 她姊夫的汽車是德國制。

definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
